overview:
Moyers has worked with some of the world’s leading private equity firms and investment firms. He previously also served as KPMG’s office managing partner in Richmond, Va., from 2000-2008. Moyers joined KPMG LLP in 1977 and was admitted to the partnership in 1986.

He holds a bachelor of science degree in commerce from the University of Virginia, and is a Certified Public Accountant in Virginia. He also serves on the board of directors and the executive committee of the YMCA of Greater Richmond, and is also on the board of the Richmond Ballet.

relationships.title: National Sector Leader of the U.S. Private Equity Group
